summary: Provides utilities for managing a cooldown list of model deployments within the routing layer. Functions add deployments to the cooldown list, retrieve the current cooldown set (synchronously and asynchronously), and evaluate whether a deployment should be placed in cooldown based on recent failure rates and configured policies.
business_intent: Automatically protect the routing system from repeatedly selecting failing or unstable deployments by temporarily pausing them, thereby improving overall request success rates and service reliability.
